1.title: The world out there is fast and furious

choices: Find a local bar, places like that usually keep a lot of information...
Hit up downtown to try and uncover some leads...
Review the files your boss gave you on the groups top enforcers...
111.content:
Your name was Mike Hudson, age 49. You had short black hair and a small goatee along with green eyes and a small scar near your chin from a bad knife fight you had during one of your older jobs. You were an undercover cop in Chicago, Illinois, one of the best there were. In your 12 years on the force no one had busted up more criminal operations than you, with your closet rival only averaging about half as much. You also had a habit of messing with the criminals you tangle with, often leading to a gun or fist fight. You looked out as the vast sprawling desert under the endless blue sky above as you headed towards California. You had a new job, one that required you to travel almost halfway across the country to Los Angeles. There was a big name player named Jackie Enzolez, who had been building quite a reputation for himself in the underground. Your task was to get inside his circle and put a stop to it before any more bodies were found like his last batch of victims.


Your time working with some of the worst scum of the earth had left you hardened, but this guy made your skin crawl. You had thought you'd seen it all... but in truth you were just beginning to step into the big leagues. "I should get there by nightfall, this guy moves quick and doesn't stay in one place for too long, I'll have to join up with his group by tomorrow or the whole gang might get away again." You say as you roll down the window of your orange 2009 Dodge Challenger R/T.

http://media.caranddriver.com/images/09q...

"I've got to put these guys out of business, too many people have already gotten hurt. This needs to end. Now." The sun slowly begins to dip over a few hills off in the distance when the city of LA starts to come into view. You had maybe a little more than 24 hours to meet up with these guys, but where would you start?
111.title: On the road once again...

choices: One of the local car showrooms
1112.content: You decided to check around Downtown LA for any sign of Jackie or his "friends". You knew that he often hung around out of the way places in the towns he visited. The deeper you went into the city, the more likely you would be able to get more information of Jackie's wherabouts. You decided to check,
1112.title: Hit up downtown to try and uncover some leads...

choices: Walk over to the bar and order a drink
11121.content:
You began cruising around the seedier parts of downtown when a large pink neon cat caught your eye. It stood about 7 feet tall and overlooked a sign advertising a specialty strip club. "The Pink Kitten, huh?" You said under your breath as you parked on the edge of the sidewalk and got out. "A place like this probably draws a pretty good amount of low lifes from all around the city, I suppose its as good a place to start as any." You made sure your gun was tucked safely out of sight and walked up to a large bouncer standing in the violet hallway leading to the showroom. "Hold up there pal, I don't think I've seen you around here before. If you don't have a club membership it'll cost you $100 to get inside, trust me though... its well worth it." The bouncer said with a smile as he held out one of his muscular hands.


You didn't wanna pay just to check this place out, but walking back outside right after coming in might draw unwanted attention. "Sure thing, here you go sir." You reply as you pull a couple of bills from your wallet and hand them to the man. "Alright, step in and enjoy. Don't forget to tip." The big man said as he stepped aside and let you past. The inside of this place was decorated with tons of flashing lights in an otherwise darkened room and several woman in bikinis were serving drinks and dancing. Most of them had bunny or cat ear headbands and tails attached to their outfits, but some had full-body costumes featuring other animals. Even the patrons were wearing their own fursuits. The whole place really wasn't to your tastes, but you were sure you could find something here...
11121.title: Time to hit the clubs...

choices: The old man in the suit
111211.content: You take a seat next to the bar and wait for someone to serve you. "Hello cutie, what can I get you?" A young woman with pink rabbit ears in her hair asked as she sat a glass of scotch in front of an older gentleman in a suit and walked over to you. "I'll just have a whiskey on the rocks, please. Jack Daniels." You say as you pull out your wallet and put a couple of ten dollar bills on the counter. "Right away sir, thank you for the tip! We're super busy today!" The girl replied happily as she walked over to get a bottle form the shelf. While she was busy you turned to look back at the old guy she had just served. He seemed somewhat out of place in a joint like this with his gray suit and fedora... maybe he'd have a lead or two. Just as you are about to turn and engage him in conversation he polishes off his drink and gets up to leave while the waitress places your drink in front of you. Both of them are too busy to wait around for you to get done talking with the other...guess you'll have to make a quick choice on who to question.
111211.title: Drink order

1112112.content: You breathe out a soft sigh and put another ten dollar bill on the table just as the waitress is about to turn away from you. "Oh my! Is that another tip for me? You sure are nice, sweetie." The woman says as she reaches for the dollar bill, only to have you put your hand on it before she can take it. "Hey, what gives? If this wasn't for me what did you set it down on the table for? You already paid for your drink." She says with a somewhat confused look on her face. "This is a tip for you, but I'll need a bit more service first." You reply with a sly grin. The woman smiles and without taking her hand off the bill puts her wrist on her hip and raises an eyebrow. "I can take my top off for ya, but it'll cost a bit more than that honey..." She smirks as she leans in closer to show off her boobs to you. "No thanks. I need some info if thats okay... see I'm looking for someone and I'm short on leads at the moment..." You fill her in on as much the department would let you disclose and wait for her to answer. After a few moments of thinking she decides to give you an offer. "Okay hun, I think I might be able to help you out there... but it'll run you $50 for that kind of information." You'll be pretty much broke if you hand over the cash, but you've already spent so much money to get this far...
1112112.title: A big tip

choices: An abandoned house in a bad neighborhood
11121121.content: You already paid so much money getting this far you couldn't stand walking out without getting a single lead on your target. "Alright, I'll pay, but you had better tell me more than I could find shaking down bums off the street." You say as you place a couple of fresh bills on the table. "Just make sure to keep it to yourself hon, we could both get in trouble if someone traces the information back to me. Now take this, finish your drink, and get the hell out before someone notices us talking this long." With that she reaches down into her cleavage and removes a small fold of paper she was keeping inside her bra. "Follow the instructions written on here, I've gotta go take the next order." She whispers as she moves over to a man in a tank top who just sat down on a stool near the edge of the counter. You finish your drink in a single large gulp, stuff the note in your pocket and head back out the door. "Leaving so soon? Must not have had much cash on ya then..." The bouncer says as he accepts a roll of cash from a guy who looked like a loan shark. "Nah, they cleaned me out..." You call back as you head for your car. Once you are in the security of your vehicle you unfold the paper and follow the directions on it. About a half hour later you pull up to...
11121121.title: A big tip in return

111211211.content: Before you stood a two story house surrounded by a rusty chain-link fence and a sea of weeds. Almost all of the windows were broken out and the front door looked like it could fall of the hinges at any second. "And here I was hoping to pay a visit to a mansion or a day spa." You chuckle as you take a spare clip of bullets for your gun and place it in your coat where you'd have quick and easy access to it. Once you make sure the coast is clear you get out of your car and carefully walk through the untrimed lawn up to the front door. You keep your gun at the ready as the door slowly slides open and step into the poorly lit building. After turning on a small flashlight you give the note another read and see that it simply says "upstairs" in bright red ink. Guess you should start there.
111211211.title: Nice place they got here

1112112111.content: You try to make as little noise as possible as you make your way up the creaky wooden staircase to the upper level of the house. Luckily, aside from some spider webs and a few bugs the place seemed to be completely empty... for now. You don't waste any time moving down the hallway and decide to check the door that you guessed would lead into the bathroom. You grip the knob, but it doesn't turn in the slightest... meaning it was either heavily rusted or locked. Should you risk the loud noise trying to break the door open... or just move to another room?
1112112111.title: This place really needs some DIY care...

choices: Several pounds of hard drugs and narcotics
11121121112.content: You decided not to risk the noise since it would probably draw a lot of unwanted attention in a neighborhood like this so you move further down the hall. Your flashlight was starting to flicker a bit as its battery died but just enough moonlight was getting in through the cracks in the roof that you were able to make your way into a nearby bedroom. As you walked in you instinctively felt around for a light switch and flipped it on, not expecting much to happen. To your surprise, the lights in the room actually flashed on and illuminated the entire room as if it were brand new. More concerning than the working lights, however, were the two large black cases sitting on the bed. "What do we have here?" You say as you pop one open to find...
11121121112.title: A couple of cases

choices: Try to talk your way out
111211211122.content: Inside the case were several bags of white and green substances along with several bottles of unlabeled pills and syringes. "There must be well over $10,000 worth of drugs in here..." You say as you close the first case shut and turn your eyes to the second. You were just about to reach out and grab it when the barrel of a handgun was placed at the back of your head. "Don't move or you die." A voice said as you raised both your hands.
111211211122.title: Not alone

choices: The woman dancing on the stage
The woman dancing on the platform
111212.content: You take a few seconds to scope out the area before moving towards the main stage. Up front was a free seat with a full view of the first stripper pole on the stage, along with the woman dancing at it. She was wearing a kitten ear headband and a tail was attached to her bikini. As you make your way to the chair you catch sight of another woman, doing a striptease on a small platform off to the side of the room for a small crowd of older men who were throwing her dollar bills like confetti. She was wearing a fursuit that resembled a purple cougar. "She must be popular." You say to yourself with a smirk as you sit down and begin to enjoy the show. The woman performing in front of you was good, but you might get more answers from the other girl. Who should you talk to?
111212.title: Hello ladies

choices: You're in a hurry, just question someone else...
1112121.content: You pull a twenty dollar bill from your wallet and hold it out to get the dancers attention. "Thanks tiger." She says with a wink as she leans down for you to stick the money in her thong. "Plenty more where that came from, sweet thing. Any chance you and I could go somewhere more private?" You ask in sweet sounding tone. The dancer leans down to reply without missing a beat and flashes you a smile. "Sorry baby, I still got 5 minutes left in this dance... but if you can wait I'm sure I could arrange for us to retire to a private room." Before even waiting for your reply she then gets back up and continues the show. Do you think its worth the wait?
1112121.title: The waiting game...

choices: Looks like this is as good as you'll get, pay up...
For that kind of money you'd probably do better elsewhere...
11121211.content: You lean back in your chair and try to enjoy the rest of the show as you wait for the woman to get done. You wanted to hurry up and get out of here, the longer you stayed the more chance one of the regulars might make trouble for you. Fortunately, the lights soon began to dim on stage as the next dancer prepared to take her turn. The woman you had talked to motions with her eyes for you to follow her so you begin walking along the side of the stage towards a hallway decorated with pink neon lights. "Hundred bucks for a five minute private show, one thousand for an entire hour." The woman says seductively as she leans on a wall and begins fiddling with her top. You were hoping that the price might have been cheaper, but at least you can afford the 5 minutes. The only question is, could you get any useful information in that short time frame? "Thats a little steep for me, honey. You sure we can't discuss a lower price or perhaps a longer session?" You ask, trying to extend the amount of time by any possible amount. "Five minutes or an hour, sir. Sorry, but I'd earn more with another dance if you paid anything less. I'm WELL worth it though..."She replies as she moves over to rub up against you.
11121211.title: Deal... or no deal?

choices: A man in a suit walks in on you
She grabs the money and tries to run out on you
111212111.content:
You let out a sigh and count up some money from your wallet. "A 5 minute show then... lets hurry up." You say as the woman leads you to a pink door with the number 5 inside a pink paw print painted on the door. "Here we are sir, try not to take things too fast..." The stripper says with a giggle as she walks inside the room and leans over a large fluffy chair. The room was pretty small, but a few pieces of furniture and a large bed covered with some heart shaped pillows made it appear comfortable. "We'll begin as soon as you are ready sir. I'll set the clock." The woman says as she walks over to the bed and adjusts the small alarm clock for exactly five minutes. "As soon as you get your clothes off the timer starts."

You walk inside and take a seat in one of the chairs next to a glass table and set the money on it. "Go ahead and set the clock, but we'll be keeping our clothes on." You tell her as you motion for her to take a seat across from you. "Whoa whoa, hey mister I don't know what this is about, but I don't do any of that freaky stuff. If you've got some kind of fetish talk to one of the other girls." The stripper says as she backs away a little. "I'm not a client and I don't want your body, but I would like some information. Just answer my questions and you can keep the money, I won't tell a soul about you." You say in an attempt to get her to cooperate. Unfortunately, just as she is about to speak...
111212111.title: Getting down to business

1112122.content: "That girl seems to be pretty popular." You think to yourself as you try to move closer past the crowd of admirers. It isn't easy to get close enough to talk, but after a few minutes you manage to reach the edge of the platform just as the woman has finished unzipping her outfit and tosses it aside. The men who catch it go wild and almost knock you away, though you luckily manage to grab the platform to keep from being pushed back. "Hello? Excuse me!" You try to yell over the roar of the growing crowd. "Is there a way I can talk to you in private?!"
1112122.title: Crowd control

11121221.content: The woman keeps up the show as she moves to the edge of the platform and smiles at the crowd. "I'll be doing private dances in the back room in fifteen minutes, so don't go anywhere! I'd hate it if one of you studs missed your turn..." She said seductively as she ripped off her bikini top, revealing a pair of pasties covering her naughty bits. You tried to stay close, but the crowd went absolutely insane and pushed you away. "No doubt, she is the most popular girl here... I just need a chance to speak with her. Though I suppose someone else might know just as much..."
11121221.title: The show must go on

choices: Head to the nearby furry strip club
Find a place to crash for the night
113.content:
Your name is Richard Lawrence, age 32. You had short brown hair, emerald green-hazel eyes, a short stubble beard and a lightly muscular build. You were a friendly and easygoing guy, but was also tough, daring, adventurous and wasn't afraid to take on a challenge or get your hands dirty. You were also a skilled mechanic and possessed an impressive amount of talent behind the wheel. When you were 19, you joined the US Navy and served as a highly-skilled Navy SEAL for 13 years before getting discharged at age 31. Your time in the SEAL's left you hardened and fearless. You currently lived in Denver, Colorado where you worked as a mechanic. You owned a black 1967 Ford Mustang.

http://static.cargurus.com/images/site/2...

However, life had started to become a bit dull for you ever since you left the Navy and you longed for some excitement in your life. You eventually decided to take a short road trip to Las Vegas, Nevada. You changed into a black t-shirt, a pair of denim jeans and a pair of white sneakers. You packed some extra clothes into your suitcase, along with a few personal belongings, stowed it in the trunk of your Mustang, slid behind the wheel and set off

You cruised into Sin City just as night began to fall. The lights of Vegas reflected off of your Mustang's black paint. As you cruised down the Las Vegas Strip, which boasted some of the city's greatest attractions, you decided to,
113.title: Richard

choices: Grab yourself a drink at the nearby bar counter
Check out what other attractions the casino has to offer
1131.content: "Might as well hit the casinos before the whole night is shot." you thought "Maybe I might even win at something.". You parked your Mustang in front of a massive casino that resembled a golden palace. You stepped out and strolled through the front doors. You were greeted by the sound of casino games ringing and people chattering. The interior of the casino was much more exquisite than the outside. There were numerous people, tourists or locals, playing casino games or chatting with other guests. You pulled out your wallet and took a quick look inside. You had $5,000 in your wallet. "Now where should I start?" you say to yourself. You decided to,
1131.title: Check out the local casinos

11311.content: You decided to kick off the night with some gambling while the night was still young. You walked over to the exchange table and handed the woman behind the counter $100. "I'll take 100 chips, please." you said as the woman took the money and handed you 100 chips. "Here you are, sir." she said, smiling "I do hope luck is on your side tonight.". "Oh, I certainly am feeling lucky tonight." you replied, placing the chips in the pocket of your jacket. You walked away from the counter and looked ahead of you. You had a variety of different games to choose from. You eventually decided to start with,
11311.title: Time to get lucky

choices: Three crowns (You've won the grand jackpot)
Three wheels (You've won a brand new car)
Three question marks (You've won a mystery prize)
113111.content:
You decided to have a go at the slot machines. You usually had mixed luck when it came to these things, but you figured it was part of the fun. As you walked through the rows of slot machines, one machine in particular caught your attention. It was designed to look like a large bank vault, with lights shaped like diamonds lining its frame.

The machine was called "The Key to Fort Knox" and an electronic sign right above it said "Jackpot: $800,000,000". You began to imagine what you could do with that much money. "Ah, what the hell." you thought "It couldn't hurt to try.". You sat down in front of the machine, pulled out a casino token, inserted it into the machine and pulled the lever. The symbols immediately began to spin, going so fast you could barely tell them apart. You stood back and waited, expecting to get a loosing symbol. Suddenly, the machine began ringing loudly and flashing. You looked at the symbols display and saw that you had gotten,
113111.title: A chance to win big?

choices: Head to the nearby furry strip club
Find a place to crash for the night
1131111.content:
You looked at the symbols display and almost fainted when you saw three crowns in a row. You'd done it. You won the $800,000,000 jackpot! Overcome with a triumphant euphoria, you whooped with joy. But your celebration was cut short when you were approached by a man wearing a black suit and tie, with dark sunglasses. "Excuse me, sir." he said "I'm the head of casino security. May I have your name, please?". "Richard Lawrence." you replied.

"Well, congratulations Mr. Lawrence." the man said "If you'll follow me, please.". You followed the man to a small office near the back of the casino, where the owner of the casino was. "You are one lucky guy, Mr. Lawrence." he said as you shook his hand vigorously "If you'll just give me your account information, I'll have your prize money wired into it.". You gave the man your account info and a few minutes later, you walked out of the office a multi-millionaire.

After returning your leftover casino chips at the exchange table, you withdrew $50,000 in cash, which you put in the front pocket of your jacket. You then walked out of the casino and sat down at a nearby bench to cool down for a bit. You still couldn't believe that you just won $800,000,000 on your first try at the slot machines. After taking a few minutes to calm down, you began to think about how you were going to celebrate your newfound wealth. After thinking it over for a little bit, you decided to cruise around town and see what Las Vegas had to offer. You walked over to your Mustang, slid behind the wheel and drove out onto the streets. After cruising down The Strip for almost an hour, you eventually decided to,
1131111.title: JACKPOT!!!!!

choices: Grab a drink at the bar
Take a seat next to a stage and enjoy the show
Check out the VIP lounge downstairs
11311111.content:
You soon spotted a strip club just up the street and parked your Mustang in front of it. The place was called "The Kinky Kangaroo Club". The building boasted a 6 foot tall neon pink female kangaroo with a bulging pouch that stood above the club's enterance. The building was also covered with pink and purple paw prints, plus a few posters. "This place looks pretty high class." you thought "Sounds like the perfect place to kick back and unwind after winning the jackpot.".

As you walked through the clubs front entrance, loud techno music fills your ears. You soon found yourself in a large room that had several stages all over the room. There were several women dressed in full-body fursuits, either dancing on poles on raised platforms or serving drinks. There was also a large bar counter just to your right. There was also a small staircase to your left that led downstairs, with a bright pink neon sign above it that said "VIP Pouch Lounge". After taking a few minutes to take in the atmosphere of the club, you eventually decided to,
11311111.title: The Wild Side of Las Vegas

choices: Ask for another way to get a VIP pass
Decline a VIP pass and stay here in the public area
113111113.content:
You walk over to a bouncer dressed in a sharp black suit with a dark purple tie and designer sunglasses. "VIP pass please, sir." the large man says as he holds out his right hand. "I don't have a pass, is there any other way I can get in?" you reply as you take a step back.

The man sighs and says that you can't get in without a VIP pass, however, it is possible to buy a one night pass for $10,000. You shrug and pull out your wallet. "That's a lot for only one night, is it worth it?" you ask as you count up the bills you'd need to get in. The man grins and nods his head. "Definitely, this club is unlike anything else in Vegas. Drinks and entertainment are covered by the pass as well."

You take a few more seconds to think it over and...
113111113.title: A fee for a VIP

choices: Order a drink at the bar
Grab a seat next to a stripper pole
Sit down next to the gentlemen in nice suits
1131111131.content:
You hand over the money and the man gives you a small gold card with a fancy logo on one side and a scan bar on the other. "Just swipe that in the door and turn the knob when you hear a beep, enjoy your evening." the bouncer says as he steps aside. You give him a quick nod and thank him before heading down the stairway to a large wooden door with the same logo as the one on the gold card.

You do as the bouncer instructed and opened the door when a soft electronic beep signaled that it had been unlocked. Immediately you were hit in the face by loud music that had been muffled by the thick walls. As you walked inside bright lights began flashing in your eyes as you slowly grow accustomed to the dim lighting.

The whole room was bathed in pink and purple. Bright lights covered the expensive carpet and high class furniture. The whole lounge had everything you could ask for, soft couches and chairs decorated with cushy pillows and several large plasma screen TV's playing porn footage. There was also a small bar counter just to your right, stripper poles in the center of each ring of couches(6 in all), a door on the left that led to a series of private rooms and several women, all dressed in full-body fursuits that resembled various animals, serving drinks and dancing for a group of gentlemen in expensive suits, talking over cocktails and cigars.

What do you feel like doing?
1131111131.title: VIP Treatment

11311111311.content:
This whole place was a lot to take in, especially without a drink. Luckily, you had a way of quickly fixing that. You smile at the buxom bartender as you take a seat on the far end of the counter where you have a good view of the various liquors lining the shelves behind her. The bartender smiles back as she pours another guy at the opposite side a double shot of something that looked strong and expensive before making her way over to you.

It was somewhat obvious she was playing the part of the flirty bartender to boost the return rate of customers to the VIP lounge and maybe score some nice tips from lonely guys who had plenty of excess money from a hot streak down at the tables. Still, you felt like indulging her and playing up the part of the naive tourist to make things go smoother for the evening. One of the surest ways of getting into trouble was sticking out, especially if you seemed like some kind of high roller or player. This was Vegas after all.

"Hello, sir. What can I get you?" the bartender asks sweetly as she puts a hand on the table. You think it over for a few seconds and then give her your reply.
11311111311.title: Drink Order

choices: Start a conversation with the bartender
Chat with some of the other patrons
Find a nice spot to unwind and relax
113111113111.content:
"I'd like something really strong and smooth, on the rocks of course." you say as you rest your arm on the table and begin adjusting to the club atmosphere around you. "We just got a special vintage in last week, its over 80 proof and won't murder your taste buds." the bartender replies, never losing that seductive grin as she leans over the table. "Sounds great." you reply with a wink.

"Wait right there handsome and I'll see if we still got a bottle." the bartender replies as she walks over to a small cabinet with a lock on the front. "They must keep all the good stuff in there." you think silently to yourself as you turn away from the bar to have a quick look around the room. Most everyone was still busy doing what they were when you came in, it was almost as if no one had even noticed you come in.

"Here you go honey, I'll leave the bottle in case you want more." the bartender said as you turned back around to see a nice bottle of high quality brandy sitting next to a glass filled with fresh ice and a beautiful light brown liquid. "Oh, thank you." you said distractedly as she smiled and walked back over to her other customer. "I've got a drink, now I just need something to do." you say to yourself as you take a long sip and have another look around the room.
113111113111.title: The Good Stuff

choices: "I'll stick with brandy for tonight fellas."
1131111131112.content:
As you sip your drink and look around the room you catch the eye of an older man with gray hair at his temples who is wearing a blue pinstripe suit and fedora. In one hand he has a cigar and in the other is a shot of scotch, but both had received little attention compared to the girl dancing on the table in front of him and his buddies. She was wearing nothing but a couple of pasties, a pink throng and a smile not unlike that of the bartender who had just poured your drink.

The man in the suit has a rough face but quickly smiles at you and waves you over, ignoring the woman who had his full attention just seconds ago. You feel a bit nervous interacting with these guys, but you always enjoyed meeting new people so long as they had respect and manners. You return a smile, grab your drink and head over to the opposite side of the table where one of the guys in suits moves over to give you some room.

"Howdy kid, you new in these parts? I don't think I've seen you in here before." the man asks before you even have a chance to sit down. "Oh yeah, I just blew in from out of town. Thought I'd hit the strip and see what lady luck had to offer for the evening." you reply as you top off your glass of brandy and sit the bottle on the corner of the table next to an ashtray. "I see, how'd the old gal feel this evening. She on the rag or offering BJs?" the man asks as a few of his buddies chuckle and toss dollars bills onto the table.

You smirk as you take a long sip of your drink, it may be the alcohol, but you felt pretty proud of what you had achieved tonight. "I'd say she was pretty kind to me." you reply as the man across from you lights a fresh cigar and puts the box on the table for the others. "Nice, glad to hear it kid. Say, you want a smoke?" the man in the blue suit asks as he passes the box to the guy next to him.
1131111131112.title: New Friends

choices: "Tell me, where can I find some real action in this city?"
"You must hear some interesting things working here, tell me about it."
"Just a lap dance for now, thanks."
11311111312.content:
Tonight you were going to party and party hard, so why not get right to it? You head straight for an unoccupied couch and kick up your feet while gesturing for a bartender to come over. "Hello sir, what can I get you this evening?" she asks as she hands another gentleman his drink.

"Give me a double shot of scotch, on the rocks. Top shelf." you reply as you pull out a few hundred dollar bills and turn your attention to the woman dancing in front of you, wearing a full-body fursuit that resembled a tiger with pink fur. "Give me a good show tonight, sweetie." With that you hand over all of the bills to the bartender save for one, which you slide onto the stage for the stripper to pick up.

"Thank you, sir." they both reply in unison as the bartender heads off to get your order and the woman dancing on the pole leans down to talk to you. "Anything special I can do for you tonight, stud?" she asks without stopping or slowing down her movement in the slightest. "I'm sure I could think of a few things." you reply with a smirk.
11311111312.title: Front Row Seat

choices: "I'm in. Tell your guys I'll meet them tomorrow."
"Thank you, but this doesn't sound like something I'd enjoy."
11311111313.content:
You head over to where the guys in suits were sitting and grab an empty chair. "Hey guys, mind if I steal a seat?" you ask as you put your feet up on the stage where the girls were dancing and put your hands behind your head. "Sure sonny, we got room." one of the older gentlemen says as he pours himself a glass of whiskey. "Would you like a drink? Cigar?"

"Sure, I can afford live a little. Got any scotch?" you reply as you dig a few bills out of your wallet and toss them onstage for the girl dancing in front of you. The man hands you a glass of the top shelf stuff along with an imported cuban cigar. You clench the stogie in your teeth as the man next to you gives you a light from his gold lighter and you exhale a thin cloud of smoke.

"Thanks boys, but I didn't just come here to party." you say as you take a sip of your drink and cross your feet. "I'm new in town, lookin' for...hell, I dunno. Thrills. Excitement. You would think that winning the jackpot would be more fun...but it just doesn't provide the same kind of rush as a street race or...a big shootout or something, I don't know."

Upon hearing this one of the younger men with a small scar on his cheek grins and takes a big puff off his cigar. "You like the nightlife I take it? Fast cars, overwhelming odds...the kind of stuff that really gets the adrenaline pumping?" You give him a smile and take a big gulp of your scotch. "Yeah, that kinda stuff."

"I see." he replies as he digs something out of his jacket. "I'm from out of town too, but I've been here a few times. I know some people who could use a guy like you. Good money, but if that isn't your thing they have plenty of commodities on tap that aren't widely available to the common man."

"Such as?" you inquire as you blow a ring of smoke through the air. The man hands you a business card and lets out a small laugh. "Pretty much anything you could ask for. Guns, cars, women, men...even drugs and tech if that's what you want."

You stay silent as you look over the card. It had a logo of a black rose and an address for a car dealership on the other side of Vegas. You chuckle as you put the card in your pocket and give the man your reply...
11311111313.title: The Offer

choices: Turn them down and ask for a different job
113111113131.content:
The man folds his hands together and leans in with a wide smile. "Excellent, I was hoping for a reply like that. Before I can find you a proper job in our little organization I need a bit of info about you. I'm not interested in your entire life story or anything, but I need to know a bit more about you. What are your hobbies? Skills? Experiences? What exactly do you bring to the table?" he asks before taking a big sip out of his drink.

You think for a moment as you take a quick drag off your cigar. "Hmm, there isn't too much to tell. I haven't been in town very long and honestly wasn't much before winning my fortune. As for skills, I've served as a Navy SEAL for several years, so I'm a good shot and can handle myself in a fight. I was also a pretty good driver, even before I joined the service. I've got a few other skills, though I'd say luck is my greatest asset at the moment, what with the jackpot and all. I'm not afraid of hard work or getting physical if I need to... that's about all there is to say really." you reply.

The man nods his head and takes a puff off his freshly lit cigar. "I see... not a bad resume, we can always use competent workers, especially ones who can protect our merchandise and drive well. I think I can start you off fairly high up for a new member. Instead of the grunt work we usually assign guys to prove themselves I'll let you in on a big job we got planned coming up in a few weeks. We need a good driver for this and you sound like you can handle it." he explains.

You smile and lean back as he goes over the details. Apparently his little club is going to smuggle some important packages over state lines and plans on using a street race as a distraction to keep the cops away. Not a bad idea in all honesty. Once the man finishes the proposition he makes it clear that the risks were pretty high and could include jail time and some heat from rival groups. If you accepted the mission you'd become a full member of their organization. If not, no hard feelings... you could walk so long as you don't interfere with their plans. Decision time.
113111113131.title: A New Opportunity

choices: Head to a nearby clothing store and by yourself some new clothes
Trade in your Mustang for a new set of wheels at an exotic car lot
Head to a nearby strip club to kick back and relax
Stop by a nearby gun range and try out some of their hardware
11311112.content:
You decided to go on a little spending spree while the night was still young to kick off your new life of luxury and fun. Countless possibilities came to you as you thought of what you could spend your new fortune on. You were a fairly humble guy, though you did have a weakness for exotic cars, guns and women. You figured you'd be able to indulge a little more often than before, now that you were a multi-millionaire.

You drove your Mustang through the center of Las Vegas, searching for a decent place to start. You passed high-end clothing stores, luxury car dealerships, gun ranges and strip clubs. There were so many places to choose from, you had a hard time deciding where to start. After thinking it over for several minutes, you eventually decided to,
11311112.title: Shopping Spree!!!!

choices: A custom leather jacket, jeans and designer sunglasses
A black pinstripe suit and tie with black dress shoes
A stylish white sports coat with a gold cross necklace and platinum rings
113111121.content:
You were a millionaire now and dressing like one was the first step towards beginning your new life of fun and luxury. You pull up to a designer clothing store that carried clothing for any occasion and preference and head inside. The place was pretty huge and had everything from sports jerseys and baseball caps to three-piece suits and fedoras. "Wow, this looks nice, but I don't want to spend the whole night in here." you say to yourself as you look for a salesperson.

"Hello sir, can I help you?" comes a voice from behind you as you walk past a shelf lined with shoes and boots. You turn around and see a man in his late forties smiling at you as he puts a pair of designer loafers next to a pair of bright red high heels. "We'll be closing in about an hour...is there anything I can help you with?" he asks as you shake his hand.

"Hello there, I just came into some big money and felt I should look the part, think you can show me some of your best merchandise before you close up?" you reply as the man pauses to think a moment. "Sure sure, we have tons of great stuff. If you have the cash I'm sure we can find something you'd like. Follow me please."

After about half an hour of looking at exotic and expensive clothes you finally decide on a style that fits you and go with...
113111121.title: New Duds

1131111211.content:
You observed yourself in a mirror and tilted your sunglasses down to get a better view. No doubt about it, this style wasn't the most expensive thing around but it was damn cool and stylish to boot. Just the thing you would need if you wanted to make an impression on the Vegas strip. "I'll take these." you say as you meet the sales guy at the front register. "Your total comes out to just under one thousand." the man says as he hits a few keys on the cash register. "Cash or credit?"

You just smile as you slap a few five hundred dollar bills on the table and put your sunglasses back on. "Keep the the change." you say as you wave goodbye and head back towards the front door. "Yes, thank you very much sir!" the man calls as you shove the door open and head back to your car. "Huh, I just got some new threads, maybe its time to grab some new wheels too?" you muse as you put your keys in the ignition and pull back out onto the road.

Where to next?
1131111211.title: New Look

choices: Head down to the casino floor and gamble a little bit
Pamper youself at the hotel spa
Head out and explore Las Vegas
11311113.content:
You looked at the digital clock in your dashboard and saw it was 11:00 PM. "Boy, it's getting pretty late. I'd better find a place to crash for the night." you thought with a small yawn "The bars and clubs will have to wait until tomorrow.". You drove along the Strip, searching for a decent hotel to stay at. You eventually cruised up to the Bellagio luxury resort, hotel and casino. After having the valet park your Mustang, you walked into the hotel lobby and approached the reception desk. You asked for their best suite and paid for a whole week. "Room 856" the receptionist said as she handed you a gold key card "Do enjoy your stay.". You nodded and smiled as you picked up your suitcase, walked over to the elevator and took it up to the 15th floor.

After walking along the hallway, you reached your suite. After unlocking the door, you stepped inside and marveled at the lavish interior. The whole suite was bigger that your house back home. It had everything you could ask for, a large kitchen and dining room, a fully stocked bar, a lounge with some plush furniture and a large flat screen TV, a large bathroom with a steam shower and a jacuzzi, a master bedroom with another flat screen TV and a king sized bed, along with a large outdoor balcony that gave you a spectacular view of the Strip and the Las Vegas skyline. After getting your things unpacked, you sat down on your bed as you began to look back at everything that had happened tonight. You still couldn't believe that you won $800 million in just one night. While you wanted to go out and celebrate, the excitement from just winning the jackpot was still enough to tire you out. You took off all of your clothes, except for your boxer shorts, then collapsed onto your bed and quickly fell asleep.

You woke up the next morning to find sunlight shining in through the curtains. You sat up and stretched your arms as you let out a yawn, then stood up and walked out onto the balcony to see the sun rising over Las Vegas. After taking a quick shower, you decided to order room service for breakfast. You picked up the hotel phone and ordered a deluxe breakfast platter, which included chocolate chip pancakes, sausage, bacon, hash browns and scrambled eggs, along with a mug of hot coffee. After you finished breakfast, you changed into a fresh set of clothes, a white muscle shirt, a pair of denim jeans and a pair of brown dress shoes. You soon began to think about what you were going to do next. You were now a multi-millionaire and didn't want to let the whole day go to waste. After thinking it over for a few minutes, you eventually decided to,
11311113.title: A New Day on the Strip

113111134.content: You eventually decided to just hop in your Mustang and hit the streets. This was Vegas after all, and while a part of you wanted to indulge in some of the hotels amenities, you figured you would find a lot more fun and adventure out in the city. Plus, since you were now a multi-millionaire, you felt you could afford to live a little. You took the elevator down to the lobby, retrieved your Mustang, slid behind the wheel and cruised out onto the streets of Las Vegas. After driving through downtown Las Vegas for over half an hour, you came across,
113111134.title: Head out and explore Las Vegas

choices: Go for a classic suit and fedora
Go for a designer leather jacket and boots
Go for some high quality sportswear
1131111341.content:
You pull into the parking lot of a high end clothing joint that specialized in suits, dresses and formal wear. "Time to grab some new threads, I'm a millionaire now so I definitely need to look the part." you say as you park your ride and head in. The cool wave of air that washed over you was a pleasant change from the mid morning Nevada heat that blanketed Vegas. You walk over to a short older man with grey hair who was measuring up a suit for another customer.

"Excuse me, gentlemen. I was looking for some assistance, do you know where I can find someone who is free to help me find some new clothes?" you ask as the old guy adjusts his glasses and hands the other man a tie. "I'm just about done here, please wait a sec while I ring this other customer up and I'll be happy to find you something to suit your needs." he replies as he leads the other man to the front counter.

You wait patiently for a few minutes and are just about to leave when the guy returns with a bit of a nervous smile. "I'm so sorry sir, the other gentleman had an error with our machine and his card, it took us a few tries to get it to read properly. Now that that's done can I help you find something?" he says with a quick motion of his hand towards a shelf stacked with designer clothes and hats. "Sure." you reply in an eager tone. "Show me your best stuff and I'll pick something out."

Time to decide on a new outfit...
1131111341.title: The Clothes Make The Man...

choices: A group of the local street racers
A newly-opened luxury casino and resort
114.content:
Your name is Zach Owens, age 23. You had short black hair, sapphire blue-amber eyes and a fairly muscular build. You were a friendly, easygoing and carefree guy, though you were also a bit of a rebel at heart. You were also smart, bold, daring, adventurous, hedonistic and wasn't afraid to take on a challenge or get your hands dirty. You also possessed a great deal of skill as a mechanic and was also quite a talented driver. During your teenage years, you had a great understanding of how things like the stock market and economy worked. Thanks to this knowledge, and a few smart investments, you made your first million by the time you turned 18. Now you were one of the youngest billionaire investors and business entrepreneurs in the country. You currently resided in Los Angeles, California.

You were lounging around your large, ultra-luxurious Bel Air mansion late one evening. The place had every modern luxury you could ask for; a large kitchen, dining area and living room, six bedrooms and bathrooms, a game room in the basement with a large home theater and a wine cellar, a small library, a gym, a spa, an infinity pool and jacuzzi in the backyard, a large deck on the roof and a twelve car garage.

You sat on a deck chair next to the pool, sipping on a vodka martini as you reviewed your investment portfolio on your laptop. The stock market had seen a significant rise in recent days, which was good news for you. After squaring away several things, you closed your laptop and put it away, then finished your drink. You then started thinking about what you were going to do to start off the weekend.

You eventually decided to just drive around LA and see what you could see. You changed into a black designer t-shirt, a pair of dark blue denim jeans and a pair of white designer sneakers. After making sure you had plenty of cash in your wallet, you walked into your garage and browsed among your selection of vehicles, ranging from hyper luxurious supercars to American muscle cars. You eventually settled on a silver classic American muscle car, which you had bought from a junkyard on your 16th birthday, then restored and customized yourself. You slid behind the wheel, cruised out of the mansions driveway and onto the streets of LA. After driving around downtown Los Angeles for over half an hour, you eventually came across,
114.title: Zach

choices: A group of the local street racers
115.content:
Your name is Jason Cross, age 25. You had a shaved head, light blue-amber eyes and a rugged, muscular build. You were a reasonably friendly guy, though you were also a bit of a rebel at heart. You were also tough, daring, adventurous and wasn't afraid to take on a challenge or get your hands dirty. You were also a skilled mechanic and possessed an impressive amount of talent behind the wheel. Unfortunately, you had a rough upbringing. Your father was a deadbeat alcoholic who frequently abused and belittled you, while your mother did little to prevent it. Shortly after you turned 18, you joined the US Marines, hoping to sever ties with your parents, and served as a highly-skilled Force Recon commando for 7 years before getting discharged at age 24. Your time in the Marines left you hardened and fearless. You currently lived in Atlanta, Georgia.

Unfortunately, you had fallen on some hard times ever since you left the Marines. You were living in a small, run-down apartment and was having a hard time finding a steady job. You had been working various dead-end jobs to support yourself, but barely made enough to get by. You were beginning to grow tired of your dismal lifestyle. You eventually decided to pack your bags and hit the road, hoping to start over and find your calling somewhere else.

After hitchhiking across the country for a several weeks, you eventually wound up in Los Angeles, California. You were now walking through the streets of downtown LA, late at night. You were wearing a dark green combat jacket over a black t-shirt, a pair of worn denim jeans and a pair of dark brown combat boots. All you had with you was your wallet, ID and $4,500 in cash, along with your duffel bag, which held some extra clothes and a few personal belongings. You sighed as you sat down on a nearby bench to rest for a little bit. You were homeless, jobless and had little to your name. You longed for a chance at a better life. After a few minutes, you stood up and continued walking. After roaming the streets of LA for over half an hour, you came across,
115.title: Jason

choices: A group of the local street racers
131.content:
Your name is Luke Weller, age 18. You had short black hair, emerald green-amber eyes and a fairly muscular build. You were a reasonably friendly guy, though you did have a bit of an aggressive and rebellious attitude. You were also smart, tough, daring, adventurous and wasn't afraid to take on a challenge or get your hands dirty. You were also quite street-smart and knew how to take care of yourself. You also had a big passion for cars, along with a great deal of skill as a mechanic and an impressive amount of talent behind the wheel. You lived in Los Angeles, California with your father.

Unfortunately, you had a rough upbringing. Your mother died of cancer when you were 12, leaving you with your father. However, your father was a deadbeat alcoholic who regularly treated you like dirt. He would spend most of his time out drinking with his buddies and constantly ignored you. He would also beat you at times, usually whenever he had been drinking. You soon began to hate him for his abusive behavior. You also had problems at school. Despite getting decent grades, you would often pick fights with other students and extort money from them. You would also cut school once in a while. You were fed up with your fathers treatment and longed for a chance to get away from him, start over and live by your own rules.

You were walking through the streets of Los Angeles late one night. Several hours ago, you wound up getting into a heated argument with your father, which resulted in him kicking you out of the house. Finally though with him, you packed everything you could carry and took to the streets, never to look back. You were now walking through a shady area of downtown Los Angeles. You were wearing a grey hoodie over a white t-shirt, a pair of worn denim jeans and a pair of white sneakers. All you had with you was your wallet, ID and $1,500 in cash, plus your duffel bag, which held some extra clothes and a few personal belongings. You sighed heavily, cursing your father. You were homeless, jobless and had little to your name. You wished for a chance to turn your life around and make something of yourself. After several minutes, you stood up and continued walking. After roaming the streets of LA for over an hour, you came across,
131.title: Luke

choices: Chat up one of the drivers
Introduce yourself to one of the nearby groups
Say nothing and take a quick look around
1311.content:
You were getting hazy eyed from a lack of sleep and felt like you'd pass out soon, but didn't see a motel or apartment complex anywhere nearby and decided to keep walking for now. Your legs felt almost like jelly from walking so long, yet you kept pressing forward as you suppress a yawn. Your imagination dreamed up a luxury hotel with soft warm beds, room service and a nice hot meal just around the next corner. You were so tired you had almost forgotten how hungry you were... almost.

Just as you are about to float off into dreamland you hear the familiar rumble of a car engine down the nearby street. You felt like you should keep moving until you at least reached a better neighborhood, but the allure of a good sports car had always been too great for you to resist and this one sounded like a real beauty. Most of the vehicles you had driven before in your life were rustbuckets, but you could tell this machine was a top notch performer judging by the noise.

After slipping down a short alley you come to a big intersection with over a dozen top of the line cars, ranging from old school muscle cars to high-end exotic sports cars, formed into a small circle of sorts. Everything from the paintjobs to the windows and even the rims screamed quality. You almost didn't even notice the small crowd of people standing around the cars, chatting about past exploits and won races. You pulled down your hoodie and walked up to get a better look. You were still exhausted and starving, but the night seemed to finally be looking up...
1311.title: Midnight Gathering

choices: A group of the local street racers
134.content:
Your name is Tyler Cordova, age 19. You had sleek black hair, icy blue-amber eyes and a somewhat muscular build. You were a reasonably friendly and easygoing guy, though you were also a bit of a rebel at heart. You were also daring, adventurous, hedonistic and wasn't afraid to take on a challenge or get your hands dirty. You also had a big passion for cars, and was also a gifted mechanic and quite a talented driver. You lived in Miami, Florida with your wealthy parents. You owned a red 2015 Ferrari California T.

http://st.automobilemag.com/uploads/site...

However, despite living in the lap of luxury, you were starting to become bored with your life. Your father was a billionaire bank CEO and investment tycoon, while your mother was a renowned fashion designer. They were often away on business and you only saw them rarely, leaving you home alone most of the time. You longed for a chance find some excitement in your life and wanted to live by your own rules.

You were lounging around your family's beachfront estate late one evening. Your parents were out of town, leaving you at home by yourself. Bored and with little else to do, you eventually decided to take an evening cruise around Miami. You went to your bedroom and changed into a navy blue dress shirt, a pair of black dress pants and a pair of brown dress shoes. You walked out to your Ferrari, slid behind the wheel and drove out the mansions front drive and onto the streets of Miami. After cruising through downtown Miami for over half an hour, you eventually came across,
134.title: Tyler

choices: Grab a seat and wait for a waiter
1343.content:
You pulled in front of a large silver building with glowing neon blue and pink lights overhead. Across from a flashing martini glass was the name written in bold brilliant lights: Last Stop City. It seemed a bit cheesy, but it did manage to grab your attention as you were cruising down the street so you decided to pull off to the side and check it out.

You checked to make sure you had your wallet and keys, then hopped out of your ride to go talk to the guy out front in sunglasses and a monkey suit. "Hey pal, can I go in?" you ask as he grumbles and looks you over. You slip him a hundred dollar bill and he smiles as he opens the door for you. "Go right ahead kid, the bar's in back and the VIP lounge is on the top floor, talk to the bartender if you're interested."

You give him a nod as you disappear down the narrow hallway that curved around into the main room. You couldn't even see the dance floor and the music and lights were already hitting you pretty hard. "Sounds like this'll be my kind of place." you muse as you pass a woman in a miniskirt with glowstick armbands.

The dance floor unfolds in front of you as a DJ off to the side kicks out a fresh jam. In the back past a crowd of dancing couples you could see a large bar lit up with a back shelf well-stocked with an assortment of bottles big, small and everything in between. Finally, on either side of the dance floor were glowing tables under glowing florescent lights. What do you do?
1343.title: A Night At The Club

choices: Ask for details about the VIP club
13431.content:
You walk over to the bar, grab an empty seat near the far edge and call over the bartender. "What can I get you tonight, sir?" he asks with a heavy New England accent as he walks over to you. "I'll take a tequila sunrise to start." you say as you lay a few bills down. "I also wanted to know about the VIP section the guy out front mentioned. Can you give me the details?" The bartender nods as he scoops up his pay and heads over to prepare your drink. "Right away sir, one moment."

A minute later he hands you your cocktail and a small piece of black paper with a golden border. "Normally, we only extend invites to regular customers, but you seem like the right type of company for our club so here's one on the house. You'll need a one time $10,000 entry fee and enough to cover monthly payments of $2000 if you wish to remain a member afterwards. If you need anything else just holler." With that he heads over to a man in a hat getting impatient for his whiskey sour to show up.

"Thanks, I might check this out." you call as he begins pouring a fresh drink. You take a nice long sip of your tequila sunrise and take a moment to unwind. "This place sounds expensive, but most places worth your time are these days... I've definitely got the cash to cover it." You kick back and take a few minutes to think it over.
13431.title: Invite And A Drink

info.brief_description: You wander into the world of street racing.  What adventures await you?
info.description:
You wander into the world of street racing. What happens? YOU decide.

Don't kill off the main character
Keep the perspective in 1st person
I'll allow adult content
Add long chapters (at least 2 to 3 paragraphs)
Use as much detail as possible
Teenage characters must be 16 or older
Please use proper spelling and grammar
ENJOY!!!!!!
